name: spirit-break
flavor_text: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target's spirit. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
effect_text_simple: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
